Genesis Plain Luxe Cirrus Grey 89mm Vertical Blind (Swift directblinds)

Timelessly elegant, the Genesis Plain Luxe Cirrus Vertical Blind will add a touch of cool to any room. The durable dimout fabric allows full control over light and privacy, remaining easy to coordinate with any existing palette. Expertly contrast with darker greys or more mellow scheme to make the most of this stylish shade – an exquisite fitting for any window. Product ID: DB-VTB1253 Fabric Colour: Cirrus Grey Material: 100% Polyester Headrail: White Slimline Headrail Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top or Face Fixable     Slat Width: 89mm Control Type: Smooth Chain Operation with Cord tilt OR Wand Tilt and Pull Energy Saving Rating: ER2 - Medium Energy Saving Value - Effective Thermal Retention Light Filtering: Yes Genesis Plain Luxe Cirrus Grey 89mm Vertical Blind in Grey. Made to measure from £9.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This 89mm Vertical Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.

Stirlo Steel Grey (Blinds By Post)

Stirlo Steel Grey Plain Roller Blind The Stirlo range boast a fantastic range of dim-out privacy fabrics to compliment any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If  the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Made to Measure Stirlo Steel Grey Roller Blind | Privacy, Dim-Out Fabric | blindsbypost

from £7.72

Atlantex Solar Silver Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Available in warm, rich and deep colours with a reflective external coating that helps to retain heat on cold winters evenings and reduce the heat and glare from the sun during the summer months. This stylish silver roller blind is not only bang on trend but will also help to keep your room cool during summer and warm during winter due to its reflective solar coating. Burst Soft Grey Roller Blind (Make My Blinds)

Off-white is one of those colour categories that we will always endorse as a choice for your blind, as it brings an elements of modest sophistication to almost any colour palette. Lacking the yellows of other more beige tones, it is much more suited to softening a primary colour but likewise is not out of place in a room filled with an earthier beat. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric. Just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. These blinds are moisture resistant too so can be installed in a kitchen or bathroom. Fed up of the sun spoiling your view of the telly? Install this dimout blind and stop the glare from ruinning your favourite show. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. Burst Soft Grey Roller Blind. A wipe clean, dim out fabric perfect for any room in the house. Available in over 60 colours and patterns.

Konya Blackout Iron Grey (Blinds By Post)

Konya Blackout Iron Grey Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room. The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If both the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion. Made to Measure Konya Blackout Grey Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost

Eco Friendly FR Grey Recycled Roller Blind (Swift directblinds)

Our Eco-Friendly, recycled roller blinds are made from 100% PET recycled waste. This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment! For every Sq. Metre of fabric, 9 PET bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind! Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new cream roller blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen. Cream roller blinds are a fantastic way to add warm back into your room, whilst still staying in the neutral colour palette. At Swiftdirectblinds, quality is paramount, which is why not only do our hand-made roller blinds come with customer-first service, they now come with a five-year guarantee for extra peace of mind! Grey Perfora Aluminium Venetian (Make My Blinds)

The grey perfora aluminium blind is unique with it's small light filtering holes, this will let more light in than other blinds, even when closed, but they help this blind to act more like a screen - gently filtering the light. Best used where privacy is not the most important feature of the blind, but being able to allow the light in is most important. Keep your blinds looking their best with our easy to wipe clean aluminium slats, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. Raise and lower your blind to the perfect height, and then angle the venetian slats to control the light entering your home. Grey Perfora Aluminium Venetian

Arrow Head Grey Roller Blind (Make My Blinds)

The grey arrow head blind is a great pairing of soft grey and white to create a geometric pattern. Use this blind across your home to make a strong impact and let it become a feature in your window. Keep your blinds looking their best with this easy to wipe clean fabric, just use a damp cloth to wipe away any dirt or stains. This blind can be made upto 280cm wide - much wider than most paterned roller blinds on the market so that you can cover your largest window without comprimising on style. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. <p>The grey arrow head blind is a great pairing of soft grey and white to create a geometric pattern. Uniview 3200 Spectre Black/Grey 89mm Vertical Blind (Swift directblinds)

Our Uniview 3200 vertical blinds are flame-retardant, dimout screen fabrics. As a PVC / Polyester fabric they're ideal for temperature control in offices and hot roomns. In addition to this, our 'magic screen' blinds ensure you can still see outside but don't let people outside see in. They're great for optimal privacy control and come in a stylish set of key neutral colours. Our Spectre Black / Grey is a bold, modern choice. Infusion asc Stone Grey Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Infusion asc range, where Advanced Solar Control (asc) creates a perfect solution for any room, reducing the sun's glare whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This fabric will still allow light into the room, but giving full privacy when inside from outside. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, uPVC windows and doors. The blind is fixed by brackets which sit between the black rubber bead and the glass, they simply slide in when installing - taking minutes per blind to fit and keeping the window guarantee!  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Infusion ASC Stone Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX4137. Our Infusion range allows in natural light but has the added benefit of having an advanced solar coating which improves energy efficiency

from £20.38
grey grey-perfect-fit perfect-fit

Part of our Sakura patterned range, with a simple floral design which will bring warmth to any room. This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. Galaxy asc Blackout Silver Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Part of our Galaxy Blackout range, where Advanced Solar Control (ASC) and blackout properties are combined to create a perfect solution for any room, whilst also increasing your energy efficiency. The ‘ASC’ refers to a reflective backing on the material which helps improve the energy efficiency of the blind by reflecting the heat out in the Summer and retaining heat in the Winter. The metallic reflective backing is therefore on the reverse of the fabric, facing towards the window.  This perfect fit blind is produced in a single cell fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame.  This is a single-cell fabric, the guide wires will be exposed meaning that there will be visible holes allowing light to come through. These can be seen on our range of images above.  If you would prefer the wires to be hidden, please take a look at our 'Hive' or 'Luna' ranges.  Made to measure Galaxy asc Blackout Silver Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX6002. A stylish, blackout pleated blind produced with an asc, solar reflective, backing.

Combining two of our most popular roller blinds in one, this Amor Dolphin Grey and Haze Soft Grey double roller blind gives you the best of both worlds. Keep the voile down in the day for light and privacy, then at night lower the blackout Amor soft grey to block out the light. Our double roller blinds give you total control and practicality, with both blinds installed on the same bracket you won't need to worry about installing twice. Day & Night Brushed Steel (Make My Blinds)

The Day & Night Brushed Steel roller blind, with its textured dark grey design is both a practical and stylish blind. The gorgeous grey contrasts with the opaque stripes and gives this blind a unique feel. Combining brilliant light control with an aesthetic design, it’s a perfect addition to any window. Looking for something a little different? The alternating fabric strips give these blinds the privacy of a dimout blind, but also the transparency of a voile blind. Simply close or open the blind to move the strips to see out, or block yourself in. With their destinctive look, our Day & Night blinds don't just look amazing, but will also give you control over the light entering your room. The unique 2 layered fabric gives this blind a look like no other. Coming from the cassette down, around a bottom bar and back up is what makes this blind work. All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Please visit www.makeitsafe.org.uk to find out more. All control chains supplied with our roller blinds will be approximately half the length of the drop. If you require a longer control chain, please get in touch once ordered and we can amend this for you. <p>The Day &amp; Night Brushed Steel roller blind, with its textured dark grey design is both a practical and stylish blind. You want a black blind, your partner wants white; compromise with this relationship-preserving Battleship Grey Satin style. Organic grey with a mid-gloss sheen, it's an elegant neutral that pairs well with monochrome blinds. As our most hard wearing style, aluminium blinds are ideal for humid and high-traffic spaces Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Classic grey gets a shimmering upgrade with our Silver Sparkle Perfect Fit. Perfect for adding a bit of glitz to your kitchen, conservatory or patio door, its glitterbomb flecks dance in the light for a captivating take on conventional monochrome styles Struggling to cover your french doors? Aluminium Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The hardwearing slats are fully water resistant, ideal for spaces with high sunshine that can attract condensation Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required All of our blinds are sold with built-in child safety mechanisms. We adhere to the guidelines set out by the British Blind and Shutter Association and take safety extremely seriously. All blinds come with the relevant child safety instructions and warnings. Please ensure you follow the provided instructions and warnings carefully. Part of our Hive privacy non-Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The Hive Lusso range has a  backing. This blind with its horizontal striped design and voile panels is an elegant way to control the incoming light within your space and achieve level of privacy you desire. Rosso Softshade Clay Grey Day and Night Blind (Swift directblinds)

This mid-grey panel blind blends perfectly with any style or taste, whether your decor is on the modern, minimalist side or if you prefer to add bright and bold accessories. This panel blind with accompanying white components and grey fabric colour is a easy and quick way to update your window. Our panel blinds are value for money and easy to install. Eco Friendly FR Grey Panel Blind (Swift directblinds)

Our Eco-Friendly, recycled panel blinds are made from 100% PET recycled waste.  This means that you can decorate your window with your new sustainable blind, and contribute positively to the environment! For every Sq. Metre of fabric, 9 PET bottles are used, so you'll be positively contributing to the fight on plastic pollution, as well as getting a stylish blind! Made with a moisture-resistant and flame-retardant coating, your new grey panel blind can be just the thing to complete your bathroom or kitchen.  Add a soft pop of colour into your home with a grey panel blind.  Grey has been a constant trend shade, and this grey shade, with warm undertones adds a contemporary and stylish look. Panel blinds are fantastic as room dividers or for large panes of glass due to their large size, up to 5 metres width and 3 metres drop! At Swiftdirectblinds, quality is paramount, which is why not only do our hand-made panel blinds come with customer-first service, they now come with a five-year guarantee for extra peace of mind! Luna Blackout Graphite Grey Perfect Fit (Blinds By Post)

Luna Blackout Graphite Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind. Part of our Luna Blackout range, this perfect fit blind is produced in a honeycomb fabric and can be mounted in a 'no drill, no screws' fitting to most double glazed, internally beaded, UPVC windows and doors. The "Luna Blackout" range has a   backing. Honeycomb fabric: no visible holes or cords through the fabric. Blackout fabric: Yes. Please note, on a perfect fit blind you may get light leakage between the material and frame. Made to measure Luna Blackout Graphite Grey Perfect Fit Pleated Blind PX72001. A contemporary blackout blind produced in a honeycomb pleated fabric providing thermal and increasing energy efficiency.

Hampton Grey Pleated Perfect Fit (Make My Blinds)

For a darker grey in your window the Hampton Grey Pleated is a superb option. The colour is not created in a block but rather created from a series of short strokes of mid-tone and darker greys, which layer into a deep grey fabric. Additional shading comes from the pleated ripples that create natural highlights and pooling shadows. The Perfect Fit blind fits to the window frame itself as opposed to installing on the wall, for tools-free installation in under 15 minutes. Struggling to cover your french doors? Pleated Perfect Fit blinds are a great way to shade each pane, and provide style and privacy at the same time. The pleated fabric gently filters the light coming into your room, while still giving you peaceful seclusion. Looking for a solution for your conservatory windows? Perfect Fits are designed to clip on quickly and easily - with no screws, drilling or tools required Hampton Grey Pleated Perfect Fit
